Market

  • Uses of Market in Unnamed Package

    Methods in Unnamed Package with parameters of type Market
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Asset.buy(Market market, String ticker, double amount)
    Records a buying transaction for the current trader, Requires the current market, the company ticker and the amount being bought to ensure data is accessible within other class.
    void
    Asset.sell(Market market, String ticker, double amount)
    Records a selling transaction for the current trader, Requires the current market, the company ticker and the amount being sold to ensure data is accessible within other class.
